Asiwaju Yinka Mafe (4 Febụwarị 1974 - 4 Febụwarị 2020) bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, nakwa onye isi ndị isi nke Ogun State House of Assembly.
Yinka Mafe gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Igudu Primary school, Warri, Delta steeti
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Nana, nke dịkwa na Warri, Delta steeti
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gara Hussey College Warri, ebe o si kwaga kọleji Dom-Domingos, dịkwa na Warri, iji gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'afọ 1993, ọ nwetara nnabata iji gụọ iwu na Mahadum Benin
A kpọrọ ya na Nigerian Bar dịka Solicitor nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Nigeria mgbe ọ gara Nigerian Law School Victoria Island Lagos n'afọ 2001.
Asiwaju Yinka Mafe kwagara UK n'afọ 2004 wee nweta nzere masta ya na International Business Law na Mahadum Cambridge n'afọ 2006
O lere ma gafee ule nnyefe onye ọka iwu ruru eru na London College of Law ebe o nwetara nzere ya iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke England na UK

Asiwaju rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na ụlọ ọrụ iwu dị iche iche ma mesịa nwee ndị ọka iwu MIB na UK mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ merụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma laghachi Nigeria n'afọ 2010 iji gaa n'ihu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya.
A họpụtara Asiwaju 'Yinka Mafe ka ọ bụrụ Kansụl nke Ward atọ na Sagamu Local Government Legislative Council na Disemba 1998, ọchịchị nke biri na 2002.
A hoputara Asiwaju Yinka Mafe dịka onye otu Ogun State House of Assembly n'afọ 2011 o wee bụrụ onye isi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na Mmụta, Sayensị na Teknụzụ ma họpụtkwa ya ọzọ na 2015
Ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara Sagamu 1 nke Ogun Steeti na House of Assembly
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị isi.

N'oge ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke afọ 2019, Asiwaju Yinka Mafe si na All Progressives Congress (APC) pụọ ma zọọ ọkwa ịnọchite anya Remo Federal Constituency na Federal House of Representatives n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke Allied People's Movement (APM) ma merie
Ọ laghachiri na All Progressives Congress (APC) n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019.
